subject: Order Status Inquiry – #SSN3067
description_text:
Dear SIMSONN,

I hope you are doing well.

I would like to ask about the current status of my order #SSN3067. Could
you please let me know when I can expect it to be shipped or delivered?

Thank you for your time and assistance.


Best regards,

Adam Kubín

conversations.body_text: Hi Adam Kubín,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, and restocking has encountered some delays. We will ship your order via DHL Express within the next couple of days, with an estimated delivery date around the 8th.

Thanks you, never mind.
Have a good day. :-)

út 4. 11. 2025 v 4:06 odesílatel service@simsonn.com
